(2011) indicates that incorporating geometric information into our analysis is a fruitful direction to pursue.  Our work made no assumptions on the noise, except maybe for its magnitude. Another promis- ing future research direction would be to incorporate various standard noise assumptions known to improve active learning rates (especially the model of Mammen and Tsybakov, 1999; Tsybakov, 2004) within our setting.
